Vietnam  

1. Hanoi – Bustling capital city 
2. Ho Chi Minh City – Vibrant urban hub 
3. Halong Bay – Stunning limestone islands 
4. Pho – Iconic noodle soup 
5. Vietnamese Coffee – Strong and sweet 
6. Cu Chi Tunnels – Historic war site 
7. Rice Paddies – Lush
